remarks: (Convert ~ mapdh6N to use ` HDMap1 ` function.)  Part (6) of [Baer] p. 47 line 6.  Note that we use ` -. X e. ( N `` { Y , Z } ) ` which is equivalent to Baer's "Fx ` i^i ` (Fy + Fz)" by ~ lspdisjb .  TODO:  No longer used and should be deleted.  Use ~ hdmap1l6 instead.  Also delete unused ~ mapdh6N etc. leading up to this.  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hdmap1p6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap1p6.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1p6.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap1p6.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hdmap1p6.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmap1p6.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
hdmap1p6.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1p6.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmap1p6.a $e |- .+b = ( +g ` C ) $.
hdmap1p6.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
hdmap1p6.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1p6.i $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1p6.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap1p6.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
hdmap1p6.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmap1p6.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmap1p6.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmap1p6.xn $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y , Z } ) ) $.
hdmap1p6.mn $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( L ` { F } ) ) $.
hdmap1p6N $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` <. X , F , ( Y .+ Z ) >. ) = ( ( I ` <. X , F , Y >. ) .+b ( I ` <. X , F , Z >. ) ) ) $.
